attributes.action: Make People Financially Responsible For Self Damaging Lifestyles
attributes.additional_details: I would like people who damage their bodies through obesity and binge drinking to be responsible for their own healthcare from problems resulting from their lifestyles. This would free up valuable health service funds for those that really need help. This is necessary as Health initiatives which require people to take responsibility for their actions clearly doesnt work. Allow for a 2 year leadin to give people time to change bad lifestyles
